General.Name: Shanghai Yaohua Pilkington Glass Group Co Ltd B
General.Description: Shanghai Yaohua Pilkington Glass Group Co., Ltd. engages in the production and sale of glass products in China and internationally. It provides float glass, including automotive glass, online hard-coated low-e glass, ultra-clear glass, and other original film series; architectural processing glass, such as off-line low-emission coating, energy-saving hollow, safety interlayer, colored glaze and other performance, energy-saving, and environmentally friendly architectural processing glass; automotive processing glass; and special glass, such as industrial glass, ultra-thin photovoltaic glass, high-quality embossed glass, aviation glass, and high borosilicate fire-resistant glass. The company was incorporated in 1983 and is headquartered in Shanghai, China.

1.Name: Ms. Minghong  Lu
1.Title: Deputy GM, Sec. of the Board & Director of the Marketing Department
